description: The Polar Magazine mod adds  Cold damage on Archwing guns by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Soul Survivor
description: Soul Survivor is a Warframe Augment Mod that allows Nekros to use Soul Punch on allies in bleedout to revive them with partial health, at the cost of consuming all of Nekros's energy.

name: Thumper
description: Thumper allows Djinn to attack the first visible enemy within range.

name: Morphic Transformer
description: The Morphic Transformer mod increases the Power Strength of Archwing abilities by 5% per rank for a maximum of 20% at rank 3.

name: Ironclad Charge
description: Ironclad Charge is a Warframe Augment Mod that temporarily increases Rhino's armor for each enemy hit by Rhino Charge.

name: Fireball Frenzy
description: Fireball Frenzy is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ember that allows Fireball to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Heat damage to all attacks, including Warframe powers.

name: Targeting Receptor
description: Targeting Receptor allows Helios to attack a nearby enemy with "a devastating Glaive-esque attack".

name: Regen
description: Regen allows a Sentinel to regenerate once per mission if killed.

name: Tesla Link
description: Tesla Link is a Warframe Augment Mod for Vauban that makes each pair of Tesla balls form energy links between each other that deal  Slash damage upon contact.

name: Poisonous Sting
description: The Poisonous Sting mod adds  Toxin damage on Archwing melee weapons by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Dual Rounds
description: The Dual Rounds mod increases the Multishot chance of Archwing guns by 5% per rank at a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Arrow Mutation
description: Arrow Mutation is a bow mod that converts any unused ammo type into Arrows, though does not affect their ammo capacity. The affected bow will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Revenge
description: Revenge allows Shade to attack enemies but only if they attacked its owner.

name: Furor
description: The Furor mod increases the attack speed of Archwing melee weapons by 2.5% per rank at a maximum of 10% at rank 3.

name: Thunderbolt
description: The Thunderbolt mod gives arrows from Bows a 7.5% chance per rank of exploding on impact for a maximum of 30% chance at Rank 3, dealing 250  Blast damage to the target, as well as to nearby enemies within 10 meters of the blast (scaled by distance).

name: Blade of Truth
description: The Blade of Truth mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases melee damage and Truth specifically for the Jaw Sword. It increases melee damage by 25% and Truth by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Striker
description: Striker mod allows Carrier to attack the first visible enemy in range.

name: Pool of Life
description: Pool Of Life is a Warframe Augment Mod that makes enemies marked by Trinity's Well Of Life drop Health Orbs upon death, with a chance to drop an additional Energy Orb.

name: Freeze Force
description: Freeze Force is a Warframe Augment Mod for Frost that allows Freeze to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Cold damage to all attacks.

name: Sudden Impact
description: The Sudden Impact mod increases status chance of an Archwing melee weapon by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Shock Trooper
description: Shock Trooper is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt that allows Shock to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Electric damage to all attacks.

name: Tempered Blade
description: Tempered Blade increases an Archwing melee weapon's Critical Chance by 25% per rank at a maximum of 150% at rank 5.

name: Ghost
description: Ghost allows the Shade sentinel to cloak itself and the user when hostile entities are within range, rendering themselves invisible to enemies.

name: Prolonged Paralysis
description: Prolonged Paralysis is a Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr that increases Paralysis's stun duration, as well as slowly pulling affected enemies towards her.

name: Gilded Truth
description: The Gilded Truth mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases Fire Rate and Truth specifically for the Burston Prime. It increases fire rate by 20% and Truth by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 80% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Deadly Sequence
description: The Deadly Sequence mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases critical chance and Sequence specifically for the Grinlok. It increases critical chance by 50% and Sequence by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 200% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Spare Parts
description: Spare Parts gives the Sentinel a chance to drop rare items on death.

name: Vaporize
description: Vaporize allows Dethcube to periodically fire a powerful beam weapon at nearby foes.

name: Rubedo-Lined Barrel
description: The Rubedo-Lined Barrel mod increases the damage of an Archwing gun by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Crowd Dispersion
description: Crowd Dispersion allows Wyrm to release a shockwave when multiple enemies are nearby.

name: Efficient Transferral
description: Efficient Transferral increases Power Duration of Archwing's abilities by 7.5% per rank at a maximum of 30% at rank 3.

name: Sacrifice
description: Sacrifice allows a Sentinel to revive its owner at the cost of its own life.

name: Extend
description: The Extend mod increases the range of Archwing melee weapons by 20% per rank at a maximum of 80% at rank 3.

name: Guardian
description: Guardian grants a Sentinel the ability to replenish its owner's shield when depleted.

name: Smoke Shadow
description: Smoke Shadow is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ash's Smoke Screen that allows Ash to temporarily cloak nearby allies along with himself.

name: Galvanized Blade
description: The Galvanized Blade mod adds  Electric damage on Archwing melee weapons by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Bright Purity
description: The Bright Purity mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases melee damage and Purity specifically for the Skana, Prisma Skana and Skana Prime. It increases melee damage by 25% and Purity by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Savage Silence
description: Savage Silence is a Warframe Augment Mod for Banshee's Silence that increases Finisher damage while active.

name: Investigator
description: Investigator allows the Helios Sentinel to scan objects and enemies it encounters. This consumes Codex Scanner, or Synthesis Scanner charges.

name: Blazing Steel
description: The Blazing Steel mod adds  Heat damage on Archwing melee weapons by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Glacial Edge
description: The Glacial Edge mod adds  Cold damage on Archwing melee weapons by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Sequence Burn
description: The Sequence Burn mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases weapon range and Sequence specifically for the Spectra. It increases the range by 5 and Sequence by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 20 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Winds of Purity
description: The Winds of Purity mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that adds Life Steal and Purity specifically for the Furis. It increases Life Steal by 0.05 and Purity by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 0.2 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Fired Up
description: Fired Up is a Sentinel mod that increases the damage of a sentinel after continuously firing its weapon for a set amount of time.

name: Entropy Burst
description: The Entropy Burst mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases status chance and Entropy specifically for the Supra. It increases status chance by a flat +5 and Entropy by +0.25 per rank, at a maximum of +20 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Fatal Attraction
description: Fatal Attraction allows Djinn to damage nearby enemies.

name: Smite Infusion
description: Smite Infusion is a Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon that allows Smite to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Radiation damage to all attacks.

name: Modified Munitions
description: The Modified Munitions mod increases the status effect chance of Archwing guns by 10% per rank at a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Shattering Storm
description: Shattering Storm is one of two Stance mods for Hammer type weapons, specializing in high impact smashes.

name: Haven
description: Haven is a Warframe Augment Mod for Limbo that makes Banish restore a portion of an injured ally's health.

name: Justice Blades
description: The Justice Blades mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases melee damage and Justice specifically for the Dual Cleavers. It increases melee damage by 25% and Justice by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 100% at ranks 1 and 3, respectively.

name: Self Destruct
description: Self Destruct allows Sentinels to explode upon death, dealing Explosion Damage in a moderate AoE.

name: Acrobat
description: Acrobat reduces the stamina cost of wallrunning.

name: Safeguard Switch
description: Safeguard Switch is a Warframe Augment Mod for Loki, that makes allies targeted by Switch Teleport become invulnerable to damage for a short period.

name: Enhanced Durability
description: The Enhanced Durability mod increases the health of an Archwing by 25% of the base health per rank at a maximum of 150% at rank 5.

name: Vacuum
description: Vacuum allows a Sentinel to detect and collect Pickups, Ammo, and Mods within the area.

name: Coolant Leak
description: Coolant Leak allows a Sentinel to freeze and slow all enemies at close proximity in a similar manner to Freeze Damage.

name: Furious Javelin
description: Furious Javelin is a Warframe Augment Mod that temporarily increases Excalibur's melee damage for every enemy hit by Radial Javelin.

name: Argon Plating
description: The Argon Plating mod increases an Archwing's armor by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: System Reroute
description: The System Reroute mod enhances an Archwing's Power Efficiency by 5% per rank at a maximum of 55% at rank 10.

name: Stinging Truth
description: The Stinging Truth mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases magazine capacity and Truth specifically for the Viper. It increases magazine capacity by 10 and Truth by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 40 and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Curative Undertow
description: Curative Undertow is a Hydroid Warframe Augment Mod that allows Undertow to heal Hydroid and his allies within range by a percentage of their max health every 1.5 seconds. Each ally atop the pool increases Undertow's energy drain per second.

name: Venomous Clip
description: The Venomous Clip mod adds  Toxin damage on Archwing guns by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Electrified Barrel
description: The Electrified Barrel mod adds  Electric damage on Archwing guns by 20% per rank at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Hyperion Thrusters
description: The Hyperion Thrusters mod increases an Archwing's sprint (boost) speed by 2.5% per rank for a maximum of 27.5% at rank 10.

name: Charged Chamber
description: Not to be confused with Primed Chamber.

Glide & Latch duration +?%
Power Efficiency -5% (multiplicative)

name: Phoenix Ember Helmet
description:
Phoenix is an alternative Helmet Item for Ember. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases maximum energy at the expense of lowering her maximum shield.
Energy Max +25%
Shield Max -5%

name: Reverb Banshee Helmet
description:
Reverb is an alternative Helmet Item for Banshee. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases maximum energy at the expense of lowering her maximum health.
Energy Max +10% (Applies to Banshee's base Energy)
Health Max -5% (Applies after all other bonuses)

name: Vespa Nyx Helmet
description:
Vespa is an alternative Helmet Item for Nyx. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases power efficiency at the expense of lowering her armor.
Power Efficiency +15%
Armor -5%

name: Hemlock Saryn Helmet
description:
Hemlock is an alternative Helmet Item for Saryn. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases movement speed at the expense of lowering her maximum health.
Movement Speed +10%
Health Max -5% (Applies after all other bonuses)

name: Pulse Volt Helmet
description:
Pulse is an alternative Helmet Item for Volt. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases power duration at the expense of lowering his maximum shield.
Power Duration +10%
Shield Max -5%

name: Coil Mag Helmet
description:
Coil is an alternative Helmet Item for Mag. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases power range at the expense of lowering her maximum shield.
Power Range +25%
Shield Max -5%

name: Meridian Trinity Helmet
description:
Meridian is an alternative Helmet Item for Trinity. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases maximum shield at the expense of lowering her power efficiency.
Shield Max +15%
Power Efficiency -5%

name: Gauss Mag Helmet
description:
Gauss is an alternative Helmet Item for Mag. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases maximum energy at the expense of lowering her movement speed.
Energy Max +25
Movement Speed -3%

name: Backdraft Ember Helmet
description:
Backdraft is an alternative Helmet Item for Ember. . Arcane is a discontinued variant that increases maximum health at the expense of lowering her movement speed.
Health Max +15% Base Health
Movement Speed -3%

name: Ancient Fusion Core
description: Ancient Core is an exclusive, special type of Fusion Core that was distributed during the transition from Mods 1.0 to Mods 2.0.

name: Legendary Fusion Core
description: The Legendary Core is an exclusive, special type of resource appearing as an ornate gold orb, which can be used to maximize any mods without Endo and Credit costs.

name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
description: The Mutalist Alad V Assassinate Key is built from a blueprint awarded upon completion of the Patient Zero quest. The blueprint is reusable. Mutalist Nav Coordinates can be acquired as Battle Pay rewards from Infestation Outbreak[1] and Orokin Derelict Survival/Defense missions and resource caches from hive sabotage. Upon using the key, the cell will be taken to an Infested Ship on Eris where they must face Mutalist Alad V.

name: Mutalist Nav Coordinates
description: Nav Coordinates are Pickups similar to Energy orbs though darker and with a "space" effect inside. They can be commonly found inside storage containers and lockers on every level, inclusive of the Orokin Void or rarely be dropped by Eximi, Feral Kubrows, and Drahks. Five of them are required to craft each Orokin Derelict key, except Assassination keys.

name: Proof Fragment
description: Proof Fragments are quest items required to construct the Limbo Theorem key (not to be confused with the quest key). They can be obtained by killing the enemies from the quest, where the fragments take in the forms of energy orbs.

name: Muzzle Flash
description: Muzzle Flash is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mesa, that makes Shooting Gallery emit a flash that blinds enemies before switching to another player.

name: Ice Wave Impedance
description: Ice Wave Impedance is a Warframe Augment Mod usable in both PvE and PvP for Frost that makes Ice Wave leave a trail of frozen ground after casting, slowing down enemies that walk over it.

name: Shield Transference
description: Shield Transference is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mag's Shield Polarize that gives Mag Overshields equal to a percentage of enemy shields drained.

name: Surging Dash
description: Surging Dash is a Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur, allowing each enemy hit by Slash Dash to add to the Warframe's Melee Combo Counter.

name: Resonance
description: Resonance is a Warframe Augment Mod for Banshee's Sonar that triggers an additional Sonar pulse with a fraction of the original pulse's remaining duration if an enemy is killed in a highlighted weakspot.

name: Seeking Shuriken
description: Seeking Shuriken is an Ash Warframe Augment Mod that allows Shuriken to temporarily reduce the armor of their targets.

name: Rift Torrent
description: Rift Torrent is a Warframe Augment Mod for Limbo's Rift Surge that increases its damage bonus with each enemy present within the Rift Plane.

name: Total Eclipse
description: Total Eclipse is a Mirage Warframe Augment Mod for Eclipse that allows it to grant its bonuses to nearby allies.

name: Tidal Impunity
description: Tidal Impunity is a Hydroid Warframe Augment Mod for Tidal Surge that allows Hydroid and all allies contacted by the ability to temporarily gain immunity to Status Effects, as well as removing already active ones.

name: Fire Fright
description: Fire Fright is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ember that adds a chance to cause enemies hit by the ring of fire to become panicked.

name: Ballistic Bullseye
description: Ballistic Bullseye is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mesa that gives shots enhanced by Ballistic Battery a chance to deal Status Effects.

name: Irradiating Disarm
description: Irradiating Disarm is a Loki Warframe Augment Mod for Radial Disarm that allows it to inflict the Confusion Status Effect on enemies.

name: Repelling Bastille
description: Repelling Bastille is a Warframe Augment Mod for Vauban's Bastille that repels new enemies when it reaches the maximum amount of enemies it can contain.

name: Despoil
description: Despoil is a Warframe Augment Mod that allows Nekros to consume health instead of energy to cast Desecrate.

name: Mind Freak
description: Mind Freak is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx that makes enemies under the effects of Mind Control deal additional attack damage.

name: Antimatter Absorb
description: Antimatter Absorb is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nova's Antimatter Drop that gives it an Absorb field to absorb incoming enemy gunfire, adding to its total damage potential.

name: Swing Line
description: Swing Line is a Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr that enables the ability to, after an initial cast of Rip Line, grant successive uses of Rip Line without using energy if cast while airborne.

name: Jet Stream
description: Jet Stream is a Warframe Augment Mod for Zephyr that grants Turbulence the ability to provide additional movement speed and projectile speed for Zephyr and nearby allies.

name: Abating Link
description: Abating Link is a Warframe Augment Mod for Trinity's Link that reduces the armor of all connected enemies.

name: Shocking Speed
description: Shocking Speed is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt's Speed that causes him and his allies to inflict  Electric damage and status to enemies they touch while moving.

name: Hallowed Eruption
description: Hallowed Eruption is a Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon. Upon casting Hallowed Ground again with a previous instance still active, the first one will detonate, dealing all remaining damage as an AoE blast with a chance to deal  Radiation proc.

name: Iron Shrapnel
description: Iron Shrapnel is a Warframe Augment Mod usable in both PvE and PvP for Rhino's Iron Skin that when active allows it to be detonated by pressing the ability key (default 2), unleashing a radial AoE attack that deals a portion of its remaining health as  Puncture damage.

name: Explosive Legerdemain
description: Explosive Legerdemain is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mirage that causes Sleight Of Hand to turn all eligible Pickups into proximity mines ready to detonate.

name: Escape Velocity
description: Escape Velocity is a Nova Warframe Augment Mod for Worm Hole that grants Nova and her allies increased movement speed after teleporting.

name: Vampire Leech
description: Vampire Leech is a Warframe Augment Mod for Trinity that causes Energy Vampire to convert excess energy into replenishing Shields, and will even boost into Overshields.

name: Capacitance
description: Capacitance is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt that converts a percentage of damage dealt by Discharge into shields, split between himself and allies.

name: Piercing Roar
description: Piercing Roar is a Warframe Augment Mod for Rhino  that gives Roar the ability to inflict  Puncture procs on enemies.

name: Afterburn
description: Afterburn is a Warframe Augment Mod usable in both PvE and PvP for Chroma's Spectral Scream that launches a single damaging elemental attack upon deactivating the ability.

name: Rising Storm
description: Rising Storm is an Ash Warframe Augment Mod that increases the duration of the Melee Combo Counter when Blade Storm is used.

name: Chilling Globe
description: Chilling Globe is a Warframe Augment Mod for Frost that gives Snow Globe a chance to temporarily freeze enemies solid that enter its range.

name: Firequake
description: Firequake is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ember that gives World On Fire a chance to down enemies caught in the flames.

name: Perpetual Vortex
description: Perpetual Vortex is a Warframe Augment Mod for Vauban's Vortex that increases its duration for every additional Vortex thrown into it.

name: Radiant Finish
description: Radiant Finish is a Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur that increases the damage dealt by finishers against enemies affected by Radial Blind.

name: Vexing Retaliation
description: Vexing Retaliation is a PvE Warframe Augment for Chroma that makes Vex Armor detonate an area-of-effect attack upon receiving 150 incoming damage, dealing procs on enemies.

name: Shield Overload
description: Shield Overload is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mag's Shield Polarize in PvP that increases the time for an opponent's shields to begin recharging when hit.

name: Shield of Shadows
description: Shield of Shadows is a Warframe Augment Mod that allows Nekros to transfer a percentage of damage he receives to any active Shadows of the Dead minions within 50 meters.

name: Detect Vulnerability
description: Detect Vulnerability is a Sentinel precept that allows the Helios Sentinel to reveal weakspots on enemies that have had previously completed Codex scans. Hitting an enemy in the highlighted weakspot will apply a damage multiplier.

name: Singularity
description: Singularity is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx's Absorb in PvP that creates a ring every three seconds to drag in enemies close enough to Singularity's radius.

name: Recharge Barrier
description: Recharge Barrier is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Augment Mod for Volt's Electric Shield that restores allies' shields when they pass through the barrier.

name: Purging Slash
description: Purging Slash is a Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur's Slash Dash in PvP that removes allies' debuffs and restores their shields when Slash Dashed into.

name: Signal Flare
description: Signal Flare is a PvP Warframe Augment Mod for Excalibur's Radial Blind in that marks enemies who are blinded on the mini-map temporarily.

name: Kinetic Collision
description: Kinetic Collision is a Warframe Augment Mod for Volt's Speed in PvP that increases Speed's duration when the player makes contact with an opponent.

name: Funnel Clouds
description: Funnel Clouds is a Warframe Augment Mod for Zephyr that increases the number of active Tornadoes while decreasing their size and removes their ability to pick up enemies.

name: Mobilize
description: Mobilize increases Bullet Jump speed and the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.

name: Firewalker
description: The Firewalker Mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Heat damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Lightning Dash
description: The Lightning Dash mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Electric damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Ice Spring
description: The Ice Spring mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Cold damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Toxic Flight
description: The Toxic Flight mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Toxin damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Battering Maneuver
description: The Battering Maneuver mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Impact damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Rending Turn
description: The Rending Turn mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Slash damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Piercing Step
description: The Piercing Step mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latching, and adds  Puncture damage to Bullet Jump.

name: Patagium
description: Patagium is a Warframe mod that increases the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.

name: Seismic Wave
description: The Seismic Wave mod increases the ground slam damage of melee weapons.

name: Adhesive Blast
description: Adhesive Blast allows weapon-fired grenades to stick to surfaces.

name: Covert Lethality
description: Covert Lethality is a mod that increases the base attack damage of single daggers and deals lethal damage on finishers.

name: Concealed Explosives
description: Concealed Explosives is a mod gives certain thrown secondary weapons a chance of exploding on impact of a surface or an enemy.

name: Arcane Pulse
description: Arcane Pulse is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to replenish additional health for you and nearby allies whenever a Health Orb is picked up.

name: Prisma Tetra
description: The Prisma Tetra is the Prisma version of the Corpus Tetra, delivering higher damage, fire rate, status proc, and critical stats.

name: Prova Vandal
description: The Prova Vandal is the Vandal version of the Prova melee weapon, offering greater damage and status chance than the standard version. Originally a potential reward for The Gradivus Dilemma, it was later offered as a reward for getting at least 48 points in a single mission in the Operation Breeding Grounds event.

name: Contagion Cloud
description: Contagion Cloud is a Warframe Augment Mod for Saryn that makes melee kills made with Toxic Lash leave behind a gas cloud that deals  Toxin damage to enemies within it for 12 seconds.

name: Calculated Shot
description: Calculated Shot  is a Precept mod for the Diriga Sentinel that allows it to engage enemies within sight with a long-range shot. Keep in mind that Diriga will use this ability regardless of the weapon equipped, which has interesting consequences when using Sweeper or Burst Laser.

name: Shield Flux
description: Shield Flux converts a Warframe's Shield to Stamina continuously after Stamina is completely drained.

name: Arc Coil
description: Arc Coil allows Diriga to zap multiple enemies within range, with a chance to stun. It has 10m range and does 100  Electricity damage.

name: Chaos Sphere
description: Chaos Sphere is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx that allows Chaos to create a circular radius that affects enemies entering within its range for a fraction of its duration.

name: Hysterical Fixation
description: Hysterical Fixation is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr's Hysteria that replenishes a percentage of your shields for every kill while in Hysteria.

name: Marathon
description: Marathon increases the maximum Stamina of a Warframe.

name: Quick Rest
description: Quick Rest increases the Stamina recharge rate of Warframes.

name: Sonic Fracture
description: Sonic Fracture is a Warframe Augment Mod for Banshee's Sonic Boom that allows it to temporarily strip armor off enemies.

name: Defiled Reckoning
description: Defiled Reckoning is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon's Reckoning that makes Health Orbs created by kills from Reckoning temporarily invisible to, and unusable by, enemies.

name: Electro Pulse
description: Electro Pulse allows the Diriga sentinel to repeatedly stun a single enemy within range using  Electricity status effect .

name: Staggering Shield
description: Staggering Shield is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mesa that gives shots reflected by Shatter Shield a chance to stagger enemies.

name: Purifying Flames
description: Purifying Flames is a PvP Warframe Augment Mod for Ember's Fire Blast that causes allies who enter the fire to have debuffs removed.

name: Cataclysmic Continuum
description: Cataclysmic Continuum is a Warframe Augment Mod for Limbo that extends Cataclysm's duration for every enemy killed inside it. This mod does not increase the duration beyond the maximum duration of Cataclysm, and the added seconds do not increase the Cataclysm's size.

name: Hallowed Reckoning
description: Hallowed Reckoning is a Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon that makes enemies damaged by Reckoning create fields of Hallowed Ground that deal damage-over-time to enemies standing in them, while providing armor to allies.

name: Dera Vandal
description: The Dera Vandal is the Vandal version of the Dera assault rifle, offered as a possible reward to players who participated in the Operation: Tubemen of Regor Event, had Nef Anyo been victorious on PC or XB1. Its blueprint and components can also occur as Invasion rewards.

name: Karak Wraith
description: The Karak Wraith is the Wraith variant of the Karak assault rifle, offered as a reward for players who participated in the Operation: Tubemen of Regor Event with Alad V victorious. Its blueprint and components can also occur as Invasion rewards.

name: Madurai Lens
description: Focus Abilities can be upgraded through the use of Focus Points, which are earned through the use of a Focus Lens, a special item that converts 1.25% of Affinity earned to Focus Points, before allocating the points to either Warframe only, or split between Warframe and weapon when using a weapon. Focus Lenses can only be installed on Rank 30 Warframes, Weapons, Archwings, and Archwing weapons. Only excess experience points gained after Rank 30 is converted to Focus points; if a Focus Lens-equipped item is polarized, the item will not convert Focus points until it has once again reached Rank 30. Items can only have one Focus Lens installed at any time; while players can install another Focus Lens over the old one, the previously installed Lens will be lost in the process.

name: Vazarin Lens
description: Focus Abilities can be upgraded through the use of Focus Points, which are earned through the use of a Focus Lens, a special item that converts 1.25% of Affinity earned to Focus Points, before allocating the points to either Warframe only, or split between Warframe and weapon when using a weapon. name: Madurai Transmute Core
description: Madurai Transmute Core is a special Core that can be used as an ingredient in Transmutation. When transmuted alongside other Mods, the core ensures that the resulting Mod will be of  Madurai Polarity. Using a Transmutation Core also removes the credit cost for that transmutation, allowing for cheaper attempts at transmuting Rare-quality Mods. Transmutation Cores do not guarantee the rarity of the resulting mod, only their polarity.

name: Naramon Transmute Core
description: Naramon Transmutate Core is a special Core that can be used as an ingredient in Transmutation. When transmuted alongside other Mods, the core ensures that the resulting Mod will be of  Naramon Polarity. Using a Transmutation Core also removes the credit cost for that transmutation, allowing for cheaper attempts at transmuting Rare-quality Mods. Transmutation Cores do not guarantee the rarity of the resulting mod, only their polarity.

name: Vazarin Transmute Core
description: Vazarin Transmutate Core is a special Core that can be used as an ingredient in Transmutation. When transmuted alongside other Mods, the core ensures that the resulting Mod will be of  Vazarin Polarity. Using a Transmutation Core also removes the credit cost for that transmutation, allowing for cheaper attempts at transmuting Rare-quality Mods. Transmutation Cores do not guarantee the rarity of the resulting mod, only their polarity.

name: Nezha
description: Release Date: December 16, 2015.. Nezha invokes sacred fire and blazing weaponry to invigorate friends, ignite foes and insure himself from damage.

name: Adept Surge
description: Adept Surge is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that increases Mobility at the cost of Health.

name: Anticipation
description: Anticipation is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that grants temporary immunity to either staggers or knockdowns depending on which was received.

name: Calculated Spring
description: Calculated Spring is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Health at the cost of reduced Mobility.

name: Counterweight
description: Counterweight is a PvP exclusive melee Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage

name: Enguard
description: Enguard was a PvP exclusive utility mod that prevents the player from becoming knocked down after a previous knock down has been inflicted.

name: Explosive Demise
description: Explosive Demise is a melee mod in PvP which causes killed enemies to explode shortly after death, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Follow Through
description: Follow Through is a Warframe mod for PvP that grants +5 energy on Respawn

name: Gun Glide
description: Gun Glide is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reduces recoil and spread when firing while sliding.

name: Impenetrable Offense
description: Impenetrable Offense is a PvP-exclusive mod that increases Damage Block at max Energy.

name: Lie In Wait
description: Lie In Wait is a PvP-exclusive sniper rifle mod that increases damage dealt while zoomed at the cost of higher recoil.

name: Low Current Leap
description: Low Current Leap is a Warframe mod in PvP that increases Mobility for a decrease of Power Max.

name: Overcharged
description: Overcharged is a PvP-exclusive mod that converts up to 25 respawn Energy to Overshield.

name: Overcharge Detectors
description: Overcharge Detectors is a mod in PvP that exposes enemies within a certain range if they are at their maximum energy capacity.

name: Overview
description: Overview is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that decreases Zoom during Aim Glide.

name: Quick Charge
description: Quick Charge is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that reduces the recharge delay after the shield is damaged for the cost of Shield Capacity

name: Relentless Assault
description: Relentless Assault is a PvP-exclusive melee mod which increases melee attack speed at the cost of decreased blocking effectiveness.

name: Rime Vault
description: Rime Vault is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Cold damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Rising Skill
description: Rising Skill is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Mod that increases Mobility and reduce Shield Capacity.

name: Searing Leap
description: Searing Leap is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Heat damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Serrated Edges
description: Serrated Edges is a PvP exclusive Melee Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Puncture damage.

name: Sharpened Blade
description: Sharpened Blade is a PvP exclusive Melee Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Slash damage.

name: Spring-Loaded Broadhead
description: Spring-Loaded Broadhead is a Daikyu-exclusive mod usable in both PvE and PvP that gives the Daikyu a damage bonus against targets 15 meters away or further.

name: Stand Ground
description: Stand Ground is a melee mod in PvP that reduces damage taken from enemy abilities while blocking.

name: Surplus Diverters
description: Surplus Diverters is a mod in PvP that grants energy upon replenishing shields completely without interruption after they have been deactivated.

name: Sword Alone
description: Sword Alone is a melee mod in PvP that increases Mobility if a Melee is equipped.

name: Tactical Reload
description: Tactical Reload is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reloads a portion of a rifle's magazine for each second it is holstered.

name: Tear Gas
description: Tear Gas is a PvP Warframe Augment Mod for Ash's Smoke Screen which blinds enemies temporarily.

name: Tempered Bound
description: Tempered Bound is a PvP-exclusive Warframe Mod that reduce Mobility and increases Shield Capacity.

name: Venomous Rise
description: Venomous Rise is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Toxin damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Voltaic Lance
description: Voltaic Lance is a PvP-exclusive Exilus mod that increases Bullet Jump speed and grants  Electricity damage to Bullet Jumps at Max Energy.

name: Adrenaline Boost
description: Adrenaline Boost is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which provides more Energy at the cost of reduced Health.

name: Deft Tempo
description: Deft Tempo is PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which increases Bullet Jump on Headshots. It is no longer usable with Launcher weapons since Update 18.5.

name: Directed Convergence
description: Directed Convergence is PvP-exclusive Supra mod which increases Accuracy when aiming.

name: Double Tap
description: Double Tap is PvP-exclusive Latron mod which increases Damage on Hits.

name: Feathered Arrows
description: Feathered Arrows  is a PvP-exclusive Bow mod which provides faster projectile flight speed at the cost of reduced damage.

name: Final Act
description: Final Act is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which increases Power Efficiency and Power Range for 4 seconds at low health

name: Final Tap
description: Final Tap is PvP-exclusive Hind mod which increases damage on 4 Hits within 0.5 seconds, effectively meaning that if the first 4 shots of the Hind's 5-shot burst land, the final shot will have extra damage.

name: Focused Acceleration
description: Focused Acceleration is PvP-exclusive Tetra mod which increases Projectile Speed when aiming.

name: Gorgon Frenzy
description: Gorgon Frenzy is PvP-exclusive Gorgon mod which increases Fire Rate on Kills.

name: Grinloked
description: Grinloked is PvP-exclusive Grinlok mod which increases accuracy while aiming.

name: Hastened Steps
description: Hastened Steps is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which provides more Sprint speed at the cost of reduced Shield capacity.

name: Heightened Reflexes
description: Heightened Reflexes is a PvP Warframe mod which increases casting speed at the cost of reduced Power Efficiency.

name: Hydraulic Gauge
description: Hydraulic Gauge is PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which reduces weapon recoil at the cost of reduced magazine capacity.

name: Loose Hatch
description: Loose Hatch is a PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which grants improved reload speed at the cost of increased recoil.

name: Maximum Capacity
description: Maximum Capacity is a PvP-exclusive assault rifle mod which increases magazine capacity at the cost of a slower reload speed.

name: Measured Burst
description: Measured Burst is PvP-exclusive Tiberon mod which increases damage and decrease Fire Rate when aiming.

name: Mortal Conduct
description: Mortal Conduct is PvP-exclusive Melee Mod which increases Channeled Damage Reflection at low Health

name: Plan B
description: Plan B is PvP-exclusive Bow Mod which increases Fire Rate for Secondary Weapons on Hits.

name: Soaring Strike
description: Soaring Strike is PvP-exclusive Bow Mod which increases Fire Rate while airborne.

name: Sudden Justice
description: Sudden Justice is PvP-exclusive Sybaris mod which increases Fire Rate when 2 Hits are made within 0.2 seconds.

name: Tactical Retreat
description: Tactical Retreat is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which increases mobility at low health.

name: Triple Tap
description: Triple Tap is PvP-exclusive Burston mod which increases Damage on 2 Hits within 0.2 seconds.

name: Vital Systems Bypass
description: Vital Systems Bypass is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that gives the Warframe constant health regeneration but lengthens the delay before their shield recharges after being damaged.

name: Armored Evade
description: Armored Evade is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that reduces Slide and increases Damage Resistance while dodging.

name: Guided Ordinance
description: Guided Ordnance is an assault rifle mod that temporarily increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

name: Strun Wraith
description: The Strun Wraith is the first Wraith weapon, which was made available as a reward for the Survival Weekend Event. It is a modified version of the Strun shotgun, featuring improved stats and firing characteristics.

name: Ore Gaze
description: Ore Gaze is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas that modifies Petrify to cause enemies turned to stone to be scanned into the codex and have a chance to make them drop extra loot.

name: Tectonic Fracture
description: Tectonic Fracture is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas that modifies Tectonics to allow additional simultaneous walls, but sacrifices the ability to turn them into offensive boulders.

name: Titanic Rumbler
description: Titanic Rumbler is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas that modifies Rumblers to make one, larger Rumbler with modified stats, as opposed to the normal two Rumblers.

name: Duality
description: Duality is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox that causes her opposite form to split from her when casting Metamorphosis, creating a Specter armed with the weapon Equinox was using during casting.

name: Calm & Frenzy
description: Calm & Frenzy is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox that aids  her in spreading the effects of Rest & Rage. Enemies slain while affected by Rest & Rage spreads it to others within close proximity, for a fraction of the remaining duration.

name: Peaceful Provocation
description: Peaceful Provocation is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox that increases the effectiveness of Pacify & Provoke. Pacify converts damage done to Equinox and her allies into an aura that slows enemies by up to 40%. Provoke converts damage done to enemies within the aura into up to 15% bonus Power Strength.

name: Sheev
description: The Sheev is a close range dagger weapon of Grineer design that serves as a backup in the event that a Grineer is disarmed by any means. It offers high  Slash damage and status, but has a slow overall attack speed. The tip of the blade glows with charged plasma, which allows the weapon to deal  Heat procs on slam attacks.

name: Mesa’s Waltz
description: Mesa's Waltz is a PvP-only Warframe Augment Mod that allows Mesa to roll while channeling Peacemaker, at the cost of some energy.

name: Rumbled
description: Rumbled is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas's Rumblers in PvP that transforms Atlas into a Rumbler and grants additional armor that absorbs damage.

name: Push & Pull
description: Push & Pull is a Warframe Augment Mod for Equinox's Metamorphosis in PvP that Staggers enemies within 6m when switching to day-form, or knocks them down if switching to night-form.

name: Antimatter Mine
description: Antimatter Mine is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nova's Antimatter Drop in PvP which creates a fully charged stationary orb, that either explodes after 6 seconds or on enemy proximity.

name: Prism Guard
description: Prism Guard is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mirage's Prism in PvP that causes the prism to follow above her.

name: Deceptive Bond
description: Deceptive Bond is a Warframe Augment Mod for Loki's Decoy in PvP that redirects damage dealt to Loki to the decoy, and vice versa.

name: Discharge Strike
description: Discharge Strike is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nekros's Soul Punch in PvP that depletes energy from an opponent.

name: Power of Three
description: Power of Three is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ivara's Quiver in PvP that fires three additional arrows but consumes extra energy.

name: Anti-Flak Plating
description: Anti-Flak Plating is PvP-exclusive Warframe mod which grants resistance to  Blast damage but reduces Mobility.

name: Skull Shots (Viper)
description: Skull Shots is PvP-exclusive Viper mod which increases Ammo Efficiency for 1 second, on Headshot.

name: Brain Storm (Grakata)
description: Brain Storm is PvP-exclusive Grakata mod that increases Ammo Efficiency for 0.5 second on headshot.

name: Ambush Optics (Rubico)
description: Ambush Optics is PvP-exclusive Rubico mod that decreases zoom.

name: Shrapnel Rounds (Marelok)
description: Shrapnel Rounds is PvP-exclusive Marelok mod which increases Multishot for reduced Damage.

name: Thundermiter (Miter)
description: Thundermiter is PvP-exclusive Miter mod which lets charged Projectiles explode but reduces Fire Rate.

name: Static Alacrity (Staticor)
description: Static Alacrity is PvP-exclusive Staticor mod which increases Flight Speed but reduces Explosion Radius.

name: Emergent Aftermath
description: Emergent Aftermath is PvP-exclusive Sniper Rifle mod which temporarily increases Reload Speed for 3 seconds upon a kill.

name: Energy Conversion
description: Energy Conversion is a Warframe mod that increases Power Strength for the next ability cast after picking up an energy orb.

name: Health Conversion
description: Health Conversion is a Warframe mod that grants additional armor that stacks up to 3 times on picking up a health orb. Taking damage will consume a stack after 3 seconds.  This armor bonus is taken into account for abilities that use armor to calculate aspects of their functionality, including Rhino's Iron Skin, Nezha's Warding Halo, and Frost's Snow Globe.

name: Snipetron Vandal
description: The Snipetron Vandal is the Vandal version of the Snipetron, first awarded as a special-edition reward for killing 20 Informers in the Informant Event and can be found as a Sortie Reward. The Snipetron Vandal has better characteristics than the regular Snipetron in magazine size and reload speed, but sacrifices  Impact and  Slash damages in order to boost its  Puncture damage.

name: Quanta Vandal
description: The Quanta Vandal is the Vandal form of the Quanta mining laser cutter, offered as a reward for attaining a minimum of 1,500 points in the Operation False Profit event. It features a larger magazine size, higher status chance and increased secondary fire damage output over the original.

name: Xiphos
description: The Xiphos is a Landing Craft, which can serve as an alternative transportation choice to the Liset. If the Xiphos is the selected Landing Craft, using an Air Support Charge will have Ordis deploy a sentry gun. The Xiphos landed in Update 18.5.

name: Mantis
description: The Mantis is a Landing Craft, which can serve as an alternative transportation choice to the Liset. If the Mantis is the selected Landing Craft, using an Air Support Charge will have Ordis deploy a Med Tower resembling a Life Support Capsule that heals for 100 Health upon each activation, with each Med Tower providing up to 20 healing charges that can be activated by any player. It landed in Update 17.5.

name: Scimitar
description: The Scimitar is a Landing Craft, which can serve as an alternative transportation choice to the Liset. If the Scimitar is the selected Landing Craft, using an Air Support Charge will have Ordis deploy a Carpet Bomb ability. The Scimitar landed in Update 18.0.

name: Sands of Inaros
description: Sands of Inaros is an optional Quest introduced in Update 18.5, involving Baro Ki'Teer's interest in the hidden treasures underneath Mars. Completing this quest will reward the Inaros Warframe.

name: Harkonar Scope
description: Harkonar Scope is a Sniper Mod that increases a sniper rifle's combo duration while aiming.

name: Acid Shells
description: Acid Shells is a Sobek-exclusive mod that causes enemies killed by the Sobek to explode, dealing a flat amount of  Corrosive damage plus a percentage of the enemy's maximum health in an area of effect.

name: Medi-Ray
description: Medi-Ray is a Sentinel precept mod that allows a sentinel to periodically restore a percentage of its owner's health over 4 seconds.

name: Nightwatch Napalm
description: Nightwatch Napalm is an Ogris-exclusive mod that, upon striking an enemy or object, small pockets of fire will form a ring around the impact area, dealing 30% of the weapons base  Blast damage as  Heat damage with 100% chance to proc, for 6 seconds.

name: Electromagnetic Shielding
description: Electromagnetic Shielding is an Ack & Brunt-exclusive mod that transfers a percentage of damage and all Status Effects that nearby allies receive to yourself, but only when you are blocking.

name: Rift Strike
description: Rift Strike is a mod exclusive to the Twin Basolk that causes Charge Attacks to teleport the user directly in melee range of an enemy, provided the user is aiming at them before the charge attack is completed, and the user is standing within the mod's listed range.

name: Vulcan Blitz
description: Vulcan Blitz is a Jat Kittag-exclusive mod that causes enemies killed by the Jat Kittag to explode, dealing a flat amount of  Blast damage plus a percentage of the enemy's maximum health in an area of effect.

name: Fomorian Accelerant
description: Fomorian Accelerant is a Drakgoon-exclusive mod that increases the velocity of the flak projectiles and the number of times each projectile bounces.

name: Imperator Vandal
description: The Imperator Vandal is the Vandal form of the Imperator heavy machine gun for the Archwing flight system, offered as a reward for attaining 15 (10 for PS4/XB1) Battle Points in the Operation Eyes of Blight event.

name: Looter
description: Looter allows the Carrier to break nearby containers by shooting them.

name: Air Thrusters
description: Air Thrusters is a PvP-exclusive Warframe mod that reduces Mobility and gives the player a Slide Boost while airborne.

name: Fatal Teleport
description: Fatal Teleport is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ash's Teleport that immediately performs a melee finisher upon teleporting to the target, with an additional damage multiplier. Additionally, if the finisher kills its target, 50% of Teleport's energy cost is refunded.

name: Resonating Quake
description: Resonating Quake is an Warframe Augment Mod for Banshee that increases Sound Quake's damage, range and energy drain for every second it is active.

name: Phoenix Renewal
description: Phoenix Renewal is an Warframe Augment Mod for Oberon's Renewal. If a player takes fatal damage while under the effects of Renewal, they are instead healed a percentage of health. However, the augment's effects will only occur once per ally, and has a 90-second cooldown before another player can be affected.

name: Shattering Impact
description: Shattering Impact is a melee mod added in Update 17.0 that permanently reduces an enemy's base armor by 1 per rank upon dealing  Impact damage with a melee weapon.

name: Metal Fiber
description: Metal Fiber increases the armor of a Sentinel.

name: Accelerated Deflection
description: Accelerated Deflection increases the shield recharge rate Sentinels. It has no effect on the recharge delay.

name: Iron Vault
description: Iron Vault is a Warframe Augment Mod for Wukong. Aiming Iron Jab at the ground will launch Wukong into the air, and any Slam Attack performed will gain additional range and damage.

name: Creeping Terrify
description: Creeping Terrify is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nekros' Terrify that slows down affected enemies.

name: Infiltrate
description: Infiltrate is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ivara that allows her to pass through security barriers unharmed, and increases her movement speed while Prowl is active.

name: Energy Field
description: Energy Field is an Odonata Augment Mod for Energy Shell that extends its effects to nearby allies within a set distance.

name: Cold Snap
description: Cold Snap is an Itzal Augment Mod for Cosmic Crush that inflicts a  Cold proc to any enemy affected by the ability, with enemies close to the player being frozen outright.

name: Quasar Drill
description: The Quasar Drill mod adds/increases Puncture b Puncture damage of an Arch-Gun by 15% per rank for maximum of 90% at Rank 5.

name: Comet Blast
description: The Comet Blast mods adds/Increases Impact b Impact damage of an Arch-gun by 15% per rank for maximum of 90% at max Rank.

name: Meteor Crash
description: The Meteor Crash mod adds/increases  Impact damage of an Arch-melee by 15% per rank for maximum of 90% at Rank 5.

name: Kaszas
description: The Kaszas is an Archwing scythe released in Update 17.5.

name: Velocitus
description: The Velocitus is an Archwing Gauss-gun that deals heavy charged shot damage. It is the first Archwing weapon to have base  Magnetic damage.

name: Fluctus
description: The Fluctus is an Archwing primary weapon which fires a wave of energy. It was released in Update 15.7.2.

name: Dual Decurion
description: The Dual Decurion are twin rifles exclusive to the Archwing flight system.

name: Phaedra
description: The Phaedra is a large-caliber Archwing rifle that shares design aesthetics and mechanics to the Soma. It was released in Update 17.5.

name: Centaur
description: The Centaur is an Archwing based melee that also acts as a shield, which shares its own basic six-hit combo with Rathbone, but also possesses its own six-hit combo when used in quick melee (primary weapon equipped).

name: Onorix
description: The Onorix is a heavy axe designed for use with the Archwing flight system.

name: Agkuza
description: This weapon deals primarily  Puncture damage.

name: Astral Slash
description: The Astral Slash mod increases melee Slash damage of an Archwing melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Lith A1 Intact
description: Void Relics are Orokin objects that can be opened to reveal valuable treasure enclosed within by completing Void Fissure missions. They are the principal means of acquiring Prime and Forma Blueprints.

name: Charm
description: Charm allows the Smeeta Kavat to grant a random buff to its owner, indicated by a special icon next to its owner's health and shields.

name: Mischief
description: Allows Smeeta Kavat to become invisible while a decoy kavat draws fire by running toward the enemy.

name: Cat's Eye
description: Cat's eye mod allows a Adarza Kavat to provide an additive Critical Hit buff to nearby allies.

name: Reflect
description: Adarza Kavat will occasionally reflect and amplify damage back to an enemy. It seems to only happen when the kavat takes damage, and not when the player does.

name: Corvas
description: The Corvas flak cannon is a heavy shotgun designed for exclusive use with the Archwing flight system, introduced in Update 15.0. It can be rapidly fired to saturate an area with pellets, or charged to release a more powerful scattershot.

name: Rathbone
description: A heavy Hammer exclusive to Archwing use, the Rathbone primarily deals  Impact damage, which is ideal for taking down Corpus shields. This weapon shares its own basic six combo with Centaur.

name: Latron Wraith
description: The Latron Wraith is the Wraith version of the Latron semi-automatic rifle, which was featured as a reward for players who extracted 3000 Cryotic in a single mission during Operation Cryotic Front and can be found as an Invasion reward.

name: Territorial Aggression
description: The Kavat marks their territory pacifying any wild creature within it.  Wild creatures such as Feral Kubrows and Desert Skates within a certain radius will not attack.

name: Swipe
description: Swipe is a Kavat-exclusive mod that increases their attack range and allows them to hit multiple enemies per strike.

name: Pounce
description: The Kavat pounces at an enemy, stunning them for a short duration.

name: Sharpened Claws
description: Sharpened Claws is a Kavat exclusive mod that allows the Kavat to target an enemy and begin ripping it apart as it is stunned in a "free fall" animation (animation may change in the future). In addition to dealing high damage especially when combined with damage mods and boosts to critical attack damage, each swipe will remove some of the targets Armor if they possess any, making each swipe more deadly and exposing heavy units to more damage from allies.

name: Sense Danger
description: Sense Danger is a Kavat-exclusive mod that allows the companion to emit a sonar wave that marks enemies on the mini map as well as making them glow with the energy of the Kavat for a short time.

name: Bullet Dance
description: Bullet Dance is a Stance mod for gunblades.

name: Wraith Twin Vipers
description: The Wraith Twin Vipers are the Wraith versions of the Twin Vipers that have higher damage and a slight boost to  Puncture damage, but lower  Slash with a higher critical chance.

name: Pistol Amp
description: Pistol Amp is an aura that that increases the damage dealt with Secondary Weapons.

name: Growing Power
description: Growing Power is an Aura that temporarily increases Power Strength after inflicting a Status Effect on an enemy unit.

name: Shotgun Amp
description: Shotgun Amp is an aura that increases the damage dealt with shotguns by 3% per rank, up to 18% at full rank.

name: Empowered Blades
description: Empowered Blades is an aura that increases status chance and status damage (where applicable) of charged melee attacks, at the cost of draining a portion of shields per hit.

name: Assimilate
description: Assimilate is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nyx that allows her to move while channeling Absorb, at the cost of shrinking Absorb's effective radius by 50%.

name: Safeguard
description: Safeguard is a Warframe Augment Mod for Nezha that allows him to cast Warding Halo on allies, albeit with reduced durability.

name: Path of Statues
description: Path of Statues is a Warframe Augment Mod for Atlas, that makes Landslide leave a petrifying path for a short period.

name: Hysterical Assault
description: Hysterical Assault is a Warframe Augment Mod for Valkyr that allows her to pounce onto enemies while in Hysteria, dealing damage on contact.

name: Elemental Sandstorm
description: Elemental Sandstorm is a Warframe Augment Mod for Inaros that causes Sandstorm to inflict status procs based on equipped damage types and mods on melee weapons currently wielded.

name: Flash Accelerant
description: Flash Accelerant is a Warframe Augment Mod for Ember that allows Accelerant to affect friendly players within range, increasing their casting speed and giving them bonus  Heat damage.

name: Amesha
description: The Amesha is a support-type Archwing that sacrifices offensive power in exchange for area-of-effect defensive abilities that can buff and heal allies and weaken enemies.

name: Elytron
description: The Elytron is an offensive-type Archwing specializing in area bombardment, capable of dealing massive amounts of damage against multiple enemies with its selection of missiles, and boasting high durability among Archwings.

name: Itzal
description: The Itzal is a stealth and support Archwing utilizing technologies that can hide it from enemy attention while it attacks with powerful disruptive abilities, sacrificing durability for a high amount of energy capacity.

name: Cyan Ayatan Star
description: Ayatan Sculptures are ancient Orokin treasures powered by Endo that can be discovered across the system. There are two types available: the sculptures themselves, and smaller Stars which can be inserted into the larger sculptures to increase their value. These sculptures can be traded to Maroo at her Bazaar for varying amounts of Endo (with a fee in Credits), or placed within the Orbiter as decorations.

name: Steel Meridian Augment Mod
description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Steel Meridian’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Protector.

name: Cephalon Suda Augment Mod
description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Cephalon Suda's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Wise. The weapons include Bolto, Kestrel, and Supra.

name: The Perrin Sequence Augment Mod
description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for The Perrin Sequence’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Senior Executive. The weapons include Acrid, Grinlok, and Spectra.

name: Red Veil Augment Mod
description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Red Veil’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Revered. The weapons include Dark Dagger, Embolist, and Mire.

name: New Loka Augment Mod
description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for New Loka's favored weapons after obtaining the title of Pure. The weapons include Furis, Skana, and Vulkar.

name: Shadow Harvest
description: Shadow Harvest is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Scythes.

name: Cunning Aspect
description: Cunning Aspect is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Rapiers.

name: Argent Scourge
description: Argent Scourge is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Polearms.

name: Rending Wind
description: Rending Wind is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Machetes.

name: Noble Cadence
description: Noble Cadence is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Heavy Blades.

name: Thermagnetic Shells
description: Thermagnetic Shells is an Index Mod for the Detron that causes killed enemies to explode, dealing radial Magnetic damage to enemies within 6 meters of the target.

name: Kinetic Ricochet
description: Kinetic Ricochet  is a mod that allows shots from the Tetra to bounce and travel further.

name: Shield Charger
description: Shield Charger is a Sentinel Mod that periodically increases your Warframe's Max Shields and Shield Regen for a certain amount of time.

name: Static Discharge
description: Static Discharge is a Melee Mod for the Prova and Prova Vandal that causes Charge Attacks to deal AoE Electricity damage to nearby enemies.

name: Pain Threshold
description: Pain Threshold is an exilus Index mod that increases the stagger recovery of your Warframe.

name: Reinforcing Stomp
description: Reinforcing Stomp is a Warframe Augment Mod for Rhino that replenishes Iron Skin's health for each enemy affected by Rhino Stomp.

name: Savior Decoy
description: Savior Decoy is a Warframe Augment Mod for Loki that allows Decoy to absorb any fatal damage dealt to the player before switching places, along with reducing Decoy's casting time.

name: Precision Munition
description: Precision Munition is PvP-exclusive Tonkor mod which increases its accuracy by 100%, flight speed by 50% but reduces magazine capacity by 50%.
